data.title: Weather in Zagreb in february: Temperature, Rainfall, Sunshine... for February 2025! - Croatia
data.meta_description: Is the climate in Zagreb (in Croatia) in february good? Discover the weather forecast in february 2025 to prepare your trip.
data.text:
Zagreb in february: average Weather, Temperature and Climate

Best time to go to Zagreb?

Weather in Zagreb in february 2025

The weather in Zagreb in february comes from statistical datas on the last years. You can view the weather statistics the entire month, but also by using the tabs for the beginning, the middle and the end of the month.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in Zagreb in february

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in Zagreb in february.

The climate of Zagreb in february is very bad

The weather in february in Zagreb is wet (with 97mm of precipitation over 6 days). The weather's not getting better compared to the previous month since in january there is an average of 72mm of precipitation over 4 days.

The climate is quite cold here this month. Plan a sweater! The thermometer averaged maximum of 6°C. The minimum is -0°C. Thus, the mean temperature average on this month of february in Zagreb is 3°C. Note that these seasonal averages are in contrast with those observed in Zagreb in february with a maximum record of 19°C in 2021 and a minimum record of -19°C in 2012. You can expect to have about 14 days with temperatures under 0°C, or 48% of time.

In february in Zagreb, the days on average last 10:25. Sunrise is at 06:58 and sets at 17:23.

Weather data for Zagreb in february:

Weather data for Zagreb for february are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Zagreb. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Zagreb can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to Zagreb.
